mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student ( s_name, s_sex, s_age, s_iphone, s_state, s_source, s_courceurl, s_keywords, s_address, s_netpusherld, a_askerId, s_qq, s_wx, s_content, s_createTime, s_learnforward, s_isValid, s_record, s_isreturnVist, s_fistVisitTime, s_ishome, s_homeTime, s_lostValid, s_ispay, s_paytime, s_money, s_isReturnMoney, s_returnMoneyTime, s_isInClass, s_inClassTime, s_inClassContent, s_askerContent, s_isdel, s_fromPart, s_stuConcern, s_isbaobei, s_zixunName, s_createUser, s_returnMoneyReason, s_preMoney, s_preMoneyTime, u_id ) values( #{s_name}, #{s_sex}, #{s_age}, #{s_iphone}, #{s_state}, #{s_source}, #{s_courceurl}, #{s_keywords}, #{s_address}, #{s_netpusherld}, #{a_askerId}, #{s_qq},#{s_wx}, #{s_content}, #{s_createTime}, #{s_learnforward}, #{s_isValid}, #{s_record}, #{s_isreturnVist}, #{s_fistVisitTime}, #{s_ishome}, #{s_homeTime}, #{s_lostValid}, #{s_ispay}, #{s_paytime}, #{s_money}, #{s_isReturnMoney}, #{s_returnMoneyTime}, #{s_isInClass}, #{s_inClassTime}, #{s_inClassContent}, #{s_askerContent}, #{s_isdel}, #{s_fromPart}, #{s_stuConcern}, #{s_isbaobei}, #{s_zixunName}, #{s_createUser}, #{s_returnMoneyReason}, #{s_preMoney}, #{s_preMoneyTime}, #{u_id} )
